reviews.name: Samsungs are perfect.
reviews.reviewBody: I knew that I wanted Samsung, and I am so pleased that the set I bought are living up to my expectations. I am using the same soap and the clothes are coming out brighter, the dryer works the first time I set it. I have no regrets.

reviews.name: Best washer/dryer combo I have owned!
reviews.reviewBody: So far this has been an incredible purchase.  I love how it notifies you of completed cycles and even connects to my samsung TV and tells us onscreen when cycle is done so we dont “forget”.   Wash is great amd many cycles to choose from.

reviews.name: Happy with this purchase.
reviews.reviewBody: Very happy with this purchase! Had it for a month now and works great and looks nice.

descriptions.long: Samsung’s new 7.5 cu. ft. dryer allows you to remotely start or stop your cycle, schedule laundry on your time, receive end of cycle alerts, and more, right from your smartphone. Steam Sanitize+ eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria, while Multi-Steam technology relaxes and smooths away wrinkles from everyday wear.

specifications.definition: The out of box weight of the item.

In washers, this feature may be employed before, during, or after the main wash cycle. Steam aids in stain removal, activating detergent, sanitizing, and softening wrinkles. In dryers, this feature can be used to remove wrinkles or quickly freshen clothing items.

features.title: Wi-Fi Connectivity
features.description: Wi-Fi connected so you can receive end of cycle alerts, remotely start or stop your drying, schedule cycles on your time, and more, right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.¹

features.title: Steam Sanitize+
features.description: The Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 99.9% of germs and bacteria, over 95% of pollen, and kills 100% of dust mites.² Multi-Steam Technology steams away wrinkles, odors, and static.

features.title: Sensor Dry
features.description: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use.

features.title: Scratch-Resistant Tempered Glass Door
features.description: Our sleek, new flat-panel door will elevate any laundry space and with scratch-resistant tempered glass, it combines an ultra-premium design with a durable finish

features.title: Interior Drum Light
features.description: Put an end to stray socks or smaller laundry items that are hard to spot. An interior drum light brightly illuminates your laundry and the rest of the interior, so you can quickly and safely check your dryer’s contents.

features.title: Reversible Door
features.description: Choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout.

features.title: Large 7.5 cu. ft. Capacity
features.description: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love.

features.title: Lint Filter Indicator
features.description: Stop worrying about lint or fluff building up and blocking your dryer’s air intake.
The Filter Check Indicator light on the control panel will provide you with a helpful reminder when it is time to clean the filter, so your dryer maintains optimal performance.

features.title: ADA Compliant
features.description: With use of a Samsung Riser,³ your washer or dryer is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), making loading and unloading much easier.

features.title: Matching Accessories
features.description: Round out your laundry setup with a matching washer, pedestal, riser and more.
¹Requires wireless network, Samsung account and SmartThings App. Available on Android and iOS devices. Only monitoring enabled on Gas Dryers for safety reasons.
²Based on internal testing and independently verified by Intertek.
³ADA Compliant when using 27" wide riser. (Riser model codes: WE272NV, WE272NW, WE272NC)

name: GE Profile - 27.9 Cu. Ft. 4-Door French Door Smart Refrigerator with Door-In-Door - Stainless Steel
description: Shop GE Profile 27.9 Cu. Ft. 4-Door French Door Smart Refrigerator with Door-In-Door Stainless Steel at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Easily, the nicest Refrigerator we’ve ever owned.
reviews.reviewBody: We purchased and have used this refrigerator for a couple of weeks now and we’re very pleased with it. We spent a month looking at different makes and models and while we had budgeted to spend a little less on a new one, this unit quickly became the standard to which we compared the others, so we decided to pull the trigger and purchase it. Absolutely no buyers remorse here, this fridge is awesome! We love everything from the backlighting, to the storage space and the middle pull out drawer is fantastic! We had delivery and installation done by Best Buy and it was excellent! The only thing I would say that has underwhelmed me thus far is the water dispenser/ice maker. I love the autofill for the water, but the dispensing rate is somewhat slow. Also, the ice cube size is smaller than our previous refrigerator, and the dispenser tends to chop them some, even when its not on crushed ice mode.  Having said that, I would consider these items more of a knit pick than a major concern. At the end of the day, there is so much to love about this GE Profile Refrigerator, that it leads me to highly recommend it if you’re in the market for a new refrigerator.

reviews.name: Best Refrigerator ever
reviews.reviewBody: Love everything about this refrigerator. All the bells and whistles and then some. Ample space inside and the ice maker does not take up too much room. The door in door is one the best features along with the stand alone freezer compartment that can be set to a temperature’s than the edge ratio and freezer is amazing.

reviews.name: One year later...Absolutely love this fridge...
reviews.reviewBody:
What an outstanding refrigerator. It has been over a year and I don't know how I lived without it for so long.

Pros:
Great lighting - Open the French Door and the interior illuminates so you can easily find things.

Soft Close Drawers - Love these. 

Shelves and bins have plenty of room.

The door-in-door option is great for quick grab-and-go items.

The deli drawer keeps all the most commonly used items in one easy place

Freezer storage and drawers are great. Lots of room

Ice maker and water dispenser - Automatically lights up at night when you walk up to it. 

The fingerprints are still visible and not sure there is anything that can be done but it is much better than the last fridge we had. 

Easy to clean. Easy to move shelves around.

CONS:
The filter door doesn't want to stay closed. It constantly pops out

The ice bin doesn't hold much ice, to be sure to get a bag of ice if you are having guests on a hot summer day.

Nothing that would take away from a 5-star rating.

Overall: Impressive and highly recommend.

Refrigerators with this feature include a separate compartment with independent temperature controls from the main product. These compartments offer a flexible space that allows you to change the temperature based on your additional storage needs. Whether it’s a place to chill beverages for an evening with friends, keep snacks cool, or even provide extra freezer space.

A cooling system that works to create a stable climate for the refrigerator and freezer separately. This ensures that each compartment is able to maintain a separate humidity and temperature level ideal for the respective stored items. Freezers tend to require lower humidity while refrigerators require higher humidity to keep foods fresher for longer.

Ice build-up can reduce the appliance’s cooling capacity, making it work harder and consume more energy. Defrosting is necessary to maintain its efficiency and each type has its own advantages depending on user needs and preferences. Manual defrost appliances require unplugging to melt ice naturally, but offer more space, lower energy consumption, and lower cost without the internal heating element. Frost-free appliances regulate temperature to prevent ice build-up automatically. Automatic defrost systems use a timer to circulate heat and prevent ice accumulation, while adaptive defrost systems use sensors to determine the optimal times for heat circulation.

features.title: Fingerprint Resistant Stainless
features.description: Easily wipe away smudges and fingerprints for a look that's always sparkling clean

features.title: Hands-free autofill
features.description: Hands-free AutoFill uses sensors in the refrigerator dispenser to release the exact amount of filtered water you want, so you can walk away while your bottle fills up

features.title: LED Lighting
features.description: The showcase LED light wall sheds bright, uniform light throughout the interior of this LED refrigerator, illuminating every shelf and making even the smallest items easy to find

features.title: Door-in-Door Storage
features.description: Easily store and access your favorites, including taller items like wine bottles, with an innovative door in door design and convenient rotating bin

features.title: Adjustable Temperature Drawer
features.description: This adjustable temperature refrigerator drawer has 4-settings that let you store specific types of food and drink at the ideal temperature, including meat, beverages, snacks or wine

features.title: Removable Bin Caddy
features.description: Enjoy more storage flexibility and better organization with a refrigerator caddy that can store a range of items and be used as an adjustable drawer divider

features.title: Built-In WiFi
features.description: This smart refrigerator sends instant alerts to a smart device, allows for the customization of the LED light wall brightness, enables Turbo Cool and Turbo Freeze settings and more, thanks to built-in WiFi powered by SmartHQ app

features.title: Turbo Cool & Freeze
features.description: Designed to optimize food and drink storage conditions, the Turbo Cool Setting, which is accessed through the SmartHQ app, drops the refrigerator's interior temperature to maintain freshness after frequent door openings

features.title: Soft-Close Vegetable Drawer
features.description: Access fresh fruits and vegetables quickly and easily thanks to well-designed, clear soft close crisper drawers so your fresh favorites are always at your fingertips

features.title: Dual-Evaporators
features.description: This dual evaporator refrigerator features TwinChill evaporator climate zones in the fresh food and freezer sections, which help keep food at optimum freshness

features.title: Integrated Dispenser with Sensor
features.description: The integrated dispenser blends in with the refrigerator when not in use and, thanks to its refrigerator dispenser sensor system, automatically illuminates when you're close by and ready to use it

features.title: Advanced Water Filtration
features.description: A refrigerator with advanced water filtration, it produces clean, safe drinking water and ice, and removes 98% of certain pharmaceuticals. (Removes 98% of ibuprofen, atenolol, fluoxetine, progesterone and trimethoprim.)

features.title: In-the-Door Ice Maker
features.description: This refrigerator with in-the-door ice maker produces ice on demand and provides more interior storage space

features.title: Enhanced Shabbos Mode
features.description: The Shabbos Keeper connects to your refrigerator to automatically enable Shabbos compatible modes each week and before every holiday (Shabbos Keeper sold separately)

name: Samsung - 28  Cu. Ft. 4-Door French Door Smart Refrigerator with FlexZone Drawer - Stainless Steel
description: Shop Samsung 28  Cu. Ft. 4-Door French Door Smart Refrigerator with FlexZone Drawer Stainless Steel at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: So Far So Good.
reviews.reviewBody:
We were leery when we read several negative reviews, But then we realized that virtually EVERY fridge out there has lots of negative reviews, so we decided to roll the dice with this unit which is beautiful and has all the features we were looking for.  We’ve had it a month.  

It initially cooled down faster than I thought and was making ample ice in about 24 hours.  The flex drawer’s configuration is easy to adjust and is perfect for deli meat and bottled beer.   I haven’t measured with a thermometer, but I can tell that the right door where we keep milk is not as cold as the main body of the fridge so I keep the temperature a degree colder (36) than the recommendation.  Plenty of space in the freezer with an extra, shallower storage above the deep one so you don’t have to dig around as much.  

Ice maker works great, but crushed ice (which we virtually never use) comes out uneven and tends to leave a bit of residual ice on the chute which will melt and drip into the reservoir.  Not a huge issue unless you use lots of crushed ice. 

You can control the temperature with your phone which is neat, I guess, but useless to most people.  If your kids leave the door open, you’ll get a message on your phone so you can call home to give them a verbal tug on the ears.  

Aesthetically, the fridge is beautiful.  Clean lines and relatively unobtrusive branding.  Overall we’re happy so far.

reviews.name: Samsung 28cu 4Door 5Drawer French Refrigerator
reviews.reviewBody: Thrilled with this purchase.  Have needed space and this refrigerator has it!  Beautifully designed stainless steel compliments other appliances.  You will have satisfaction using this addition to your everyday cooking needs.

reviews.name: Good value buy
reviews.reviewBody:
So far this refrigerator is meeting all my expectations. Love the design and the price. I transitioned from a 2-door French door model to this 2-door 2 drawer configuration. Love it so far, especially the energy saving feature---he motor shuts down when I open the door and restarts when I close the door. 
Note: If you have a tight fit like mine, I have 39" clearance in width for this 36" wide refrig. The wall is not exactly straight and the baseboard sticks out as you can see in the photo. Also note if the countertop goes past the side of the cabinet. I can open the French door 90 degrees with the gap, but not past that point or it would hit the wall. Also, note that the side of the refrigerator is not stainless steel. I don't mind this so much since I don't entertain guests and it is easy to clean, which is more important to me.

features.title: FlexZone Drawer
features.description: A flexible storage drawer with four different temperature settings and an adjustable Smart Divider to stay organized.

features.title: Twin Cooling Plus

features.title: SmartThings AI Energy
features.description: SmartThings AI Energy Mode* helps you save money and alerts when you reach your monthly bill target by monitoring your energy consumption.

features.title: Modern Design
features.description: Modern style with sleek handles and polished door that blends into any kitchen interior.

features.title: Slide-in Shelf
features.description: The adjustable slide-in shelf is designed to fit in just half of the fridge, so you can slide it back to create more room for tall and bulky items.

features.title: External Water & Ice Dispenser
features.description: External dispenser gives you easy access to chilled, filtered water and two types of ice: cubed and crushed ice.

features.title: High-Efficiency LED Lighting
features.description: LED lighting designed to beautifully light up the interior of your fridge so you’re able to quickly spot what you want.

features.title: Fingerprint Resistant Finish
features.description: A special finish to reduce smudges and minimize cleaning.

features.title: ADA Compliant
features.description: The refrigerator display is compliant with the standards of the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), with controls all within arm’s reach and can be used with just one hand.

features.title: 10 Year Warranty

reviews.reviewBody: Great Product!  very sheak product.  works well.  I recommend this product

reviews.name: Little one likes to play with the display
reviews.reviewBody: It works well. Only down side is we have it installed in the island and we have a 1 1/2 year old. Even when you lock the display he is still able to easily unlock it. But other than that we love it.

reviews.name: Love my new GE Profile Convection Oven

name: Whirlpool - 24.6 Cu. Ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator - Stainless Steel
description: Shop Whirlpool 24.6 Cu. Ft. Side-by-Side Refrigerator Stainless Steel at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Whirlpool did not disappoint
reviews.reviewBody: I payed for this refrigerator in June and read the reviews AFTER purchase and started to have regrets before it arrived at my house. To my surprise it looked Great inside/out and wasnt noisy and the water doesn't drip out after usage like some people are saying. The right door handle sits slightly higher than the left- is the only thing i didnt like, but the Geek Squad said as you put more items in the door it should align up perfectly. We'll See

reviews.name: Great room
reviews.reviewBody: We kept looking for a fridge that would fit our needs and found the perfect one at Best Buy. Bestbuy.com makes things super easy to explore and find what you need. After finding this fridge and doing our due diligence, including reviews we decided with this one.  It’s been over a month now and we are happy with this fridge. Has plenty of room. The side by side door was a great choice for us.  It’s quiet and so far no issues.  Great quality and the cost is reasonable too.

reviews.name: Just right small issue
reviews.reviewBody: In general after 3 weeks it works properly no Big issues as I read on some reviews before: no noisy and not moving when u open the doors. Only issue is: the water drops after use the water dispenser. It is normal some drops due the dispenser system and the tray it suppose it is to collect that water drops. But in this model the water dispenser is in front and ice dispenser on the back the water drops fall on the border of the tray. So the drops jumps to the floor or slide down on the door. We use a lot the water dispenser so we must be cleaning the water drops from the floor or door which is annoying!!! Other than than no more issues

descriptions.long: Store groceries and leftovers in this 35.5-inch Whirlpool side-by-side refrigerator. It has three adjustable glass shelves, so you can create your own configuration, and its humidity-controlled drawers keep your fruits and vegetables fresh and crisp. The stainless steel finish on this 24.55 cu. ft. Whirlpool side-by-side refrigerator protects it from fingerprints.

Refrigerators with this feature include a separate compartment with independent temperature controls from the main product. These compartments offer a flexible space that allows you to change the temperature based on your additional storage needs. Whether it’s a place to chill beverages for an evening with friends, keep snacks cool, or even provide extra freezer space.

The lowest recommended ambient (surrounding) temperature in which the product can ideally operate stated by the manufacturer. Generally long-term exposure of the product to temperatures less than the minimum can result in ineffective operation.

A cooling system that works to create a stable climate for the refrigerator and freezer separately. This ensures that each compartment is able to maintain a separate humidity and temperature level ideal for the respective stored items. Freezers tend to require lower humidity while refrigerators require higher humidity to keep foods fresher for longer.

specifications.displayName: Height To Top Of Refrigerator (Without Hinges)

Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.

Ice build-up can reduce the appliance’s cooling capacity, making it work harder and consume more energy. Defrosting is necessary to maintain its efficiency and each type has its own advantages depending on user needs and preferences. Manual defrost appliances require unplugging to melt ice naturally, but offer more space, lower energy consumption, and lower cost without the internal heating element. Frost-free appliances regulate temperature to prevent ice build-up automatically. Automatic defrost systems use a timer to circulate heat and prevent ice accumulation, while adaptive defrost systems use sensors to determine the optimal times for heat circulation.
The size, arrangement, and physical configuration of the product.

name: Samsung - 7.4 Cu. Ft. Smart Electric Dryer with Steam Sanitize+ - White
description: Shop Samsung 7.4 Cu. Ft. Smart Electric Dryer with Steam Sanitize+ White at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Great Dryer
reviews.reviewBody: So far this dryer has been flawless.   The smart things app adds to the convenience and versatility of the dryer. Large capacity for bulky items. The display buttons and smart things integration makes it easy to use.  If you need to pause the load to fold a few delicates but your talking to the neighbor on the porch you can pause with smart things app until you can get inside. Any setting to provide quick efficient drying time for each load

reviews.name: So far, so good...
reviews.reviewBody: This is a beast of a dryer. The capacity is great really does save you time in the grand scheme of things as far as not having to do laundry as often. Only used the steam function once and I was half tempted to sit and watch how it worked but got bored and did something else. Ultimately chose this item due to the price more than the functionality of it. So the extra bells and whistles still getting used to. Few things that were inconsistent is the advertising description of the dryer was incorrect. It said there is no internal lighting when there is one. Also they try and get you to purchase the recommended installation equipment like the water hoses and 3 Way valve for the steam function and Samsung had already included that inside the dryer drum when it was delivered not sure if best buy is aware of that but think that should be made known. Also I think best buy had in the description that there's a lint indicator to alert you when it needs to be cleaned and there is no option for this exact dryer. I could be wrong on that just going off memory which was 2 months ago. All in all it's a great investment so far I love the innovation Samsung puts into their products and thankfully best buy was offering it at an irresistible price.

reviews.name: Great Dryer!
reviews.reviewBody: Deep drum for big loads. Dries great and soothing chime alert when cycle is finished!

descriptions.long: Samsung’s new Smart Dryer has integrated Wi-Fi that allows you to remotely start or stop your cycle, schedule laundry on your time, and receive end of cycle alerts and more, right from your smartphone. Also, the Steam Sanitize+ cycle eliminates 99.9% of germs and bacteria while relaxing and smoothing away wrinkles from everyday wear.

specifications.definition: Connects your product to an electrical outlet, allowing for immediate use (provided that other installation requirements are met).
The out of box weight of the item.

In washers, this feature may be employed before, during, or after the main wash cycle. Steam aids in stain removal, activating detergent, sanitizing, and softening wrinkles. In dryers, this feature can be used to remove wrinkles or quickly freshen clothing items.

Vented dryers take in room temperature air, heat it to dry clothing, then exhaust the resulting moisture-laden air outside through a duct, and typically have shorter trying times than ventless dryers. Ventless dryers (condenser and heat pump) do not require external ventilation. Instead, condensers cool the warm air and drain or store the resulting water. Heat pump systems reheat the cooled air for another cycle. Overall, ventless dryers are more energy efficient than vented.

features.title: Wi-Fi Connectivity
features.description: Wi-Fi connected so you can receive end of cycle alerts, remotely start or stop your drying, schedule cycles on your time, and more, right from your smartphone with the SmartThings App.¹

features.title: Steam Sanitize+
features.description: The Steam Sanitize+ cycle removes 99.9% of germs and bacteria, over 95% of pollen, and kills 100% of dust mites.² Multi-Steam Technology steams away wrinkles, odors, and static.

features.title: Sensor Dry
features.description: Automatically optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle to protect your clothes from heat damage, while avoiding excess energy use.³

features.title: CleanGuard
features.description: Have peace of mind with antimicrobial technology that protects high-touch areas of your dryer.⁴

features.title: Smart Care
features.description: Easy troubleshooting from the convenience of your smartphone.⁵ Smart Care interacts with your washer and dryer to perform an immediate diagnosis and offer quick solutions.

features.title: Interior Drum Light
features.description: Put an end to stray socks or smaller laundry items that are hard to spot. An interior drum light brightly illuminates your laundry and the rest of the interior, so you can quickly and safely check your dryer’s contents.

features.title: Reversible Dryer Door
features.description: Choose the direction your dryer door opens to better suit your laundry room layout.

features.title: Accessibility (AUI, Braille)
features.description: Aiding the visually and hearing impaired, your washer and dryer now features audio assistance, playing a different sound for each option, and braille right next to key control panel buttons.

features.title: Large 7.4 cu. ft. Capacity
features.description: Fewer loads, less time in the laundry room, and more time doing the things you love.

features.title: Lint Filter Indicator
features.description: Stop worrying about lint or fluff building up and blocking your dryer’s air intake. The Lint Filter Indicator light on the control panel will provide you with a helpful reminder when it is time to clean the filter, so your dryer maintains optimal performance.

¹Requires wireless network, Samsung account and SmartThings App. The Samsung SmartThings App supports Android OS 4.0 (ICS) or later which is optimized for Samsung smartphones (Galaxy S and Galaxy Note series).
¹This app also supports iOS 7 or later for iPhone models. SmartThings App available in App Store and Play Store. Only monitoring enabled on Gas Dryers for safety reasons.
²Based on internal testing and independently verified by Intertek.
³The Sensor Dry icon turns on when in use.
⁴Antimicrobial treatment does not protect users or other items against bacteria, viruses, germs, or other disease organisms.

⁵Requires Samsung Smart Washer/Dryer App. The Samsung Smart Washer/Dryer App supports Android OS 2.3.6 or later and iOS 3 or later for iPhone models. Samsung Smart Washer/Dryer App available in App Store and Play Store.

name: KitchenAid - 20 Cu. Ft. French Door Counter-Depth Refrigerator - Stainless Steel
description: Shop KitchenAid 20 Cu. Ft. French Door Counter-Depth Refrigerator Stainless Steel at Best Buy. Find low everyday prices and buy online for delivery or in-store pick-up. Price Match Guarantee.

reviews.name: Great Counter Depth Refrigerator
reviews.reviewBody:
This fridge was the shallowest counter depth we could find which was important in our space. Shifting from a full depth to this took a bit of an adjustment but we now appreciate that nothing gets buried!

Pros: Water dispenser works well, it's a bit tucked away but dispenses quick enough to fill a glass or water pitcher. The specs on the filter are really good. Ice bin fills quickly with clear, neutral tasting ice. The wide third drawer is awesome and holds a ton!

Cons: Freezer drawer does not pull forward when freezer is opened. Some better fridges have that feature and it would be handy. Crisper drawers are a little flimsy.

reviews.name: Freezer on the small side, but good quality fridge
reviews.reviewBody:
No complaints about cooling level or ice maker function so far after four months. The shelf and door shelf arrangement can be a little tricky if you regularly buy tall items (I currently only have one spot where I can store an opened bottle of wine).  
  
The fridge is small, as it's a counter depth, but can still really store a lot. I'm only one person but entertain about once a week and have had no trouble fitting dishes and leftovers along with my usual items. The freezer is extremely small, though. I'm just one person but if you like to make batches of soups to freeze, or buy meat in bulk, you're gonna have trouble. With my kitchen layout the counter depth fridge was really the only option, so I'm fine with putting up with it and getting a chest freezer later.  
  
Overall it seems like a very quality fridge and I'm happy with it!

reviews.name: Marlene
reviews.reviewBody: I have only had the frig for a couple of weeks.  There are just a few things that are not a 5.  In order to open the veg. drawer on the right, you have to open both doors because of the lip on the left door.   I had a side by side and am adjusting to the bottom freezer which does not seem to hold nearly as much food.  The water dispenser requires two hands which can be a tiny bit awkward.  The frig it beautiful and I hope we are together for a long time.

videos.title: How to Measure for Your Refrigerator Video
How to Prep for Refrigerator Delivery and Install

descriptions.long: This 20 cu. ft. refrigerator has a counter-depth design that gives it a built-in look. But the beauty of this French door refrigerator goes beyond the exterior. The ExtendFresh temperature management system and produce preserver help keep food fresh. LED lighting throughout the refrigerator makes food easy to find on every level.

Designated storage with closure for dairy items such as butter, yogurt, and cream cheese, helps keep these items accessible and may reduce the risk of cross-contamination.
Meets standards set by the Disabilities Act (ADA) Standards for Accessible Design
The out of box height of the item. Height is measured as the vertical distance from the bottom of the item to the top as it would be primarily used or placed.

Garage Ready appliances have been tested by the manufacturer to operate within a wider range of external temperatures than the average home environment, such as a garage which can fall below freezing or heat above 100 degrees Fahrenheit. Please refer to the manufacturer's documentation for detailed external operating temperature requirements.​

An approximated measurement (exact width may differ slightly) determined by the manufacturer in accordance with industry standards. Standardized sizes are intended to assist consumers when purchasing appliances and planning for installation.
The out of box width of the item. Width is measured as the horizontal distance from one side of the item to the other as it would be primarily used or placed.
Predicted cost of operating the product under average conditions for one year.
Total amount of space within the freezer compartment. Usable space may be reduced by shelves, cabinets, or other storage features.

values: 20 Cu. Ft. French Door Counter-Depth Refrigerator

canonicalValues.value: 20 Cu. Ft. French Door Counter-Depth Refrigerator

specifications.definition: Amount of power needed to support an electrical current.
The water filter model(s) recommended for use with the product.
The product can be connected to a program or software application on a mobile device, which then receives collected data from the product.
The manner in which a device sends data to another device over a short distance without the use of wires or cables.
Feature that allows you to quickly reduce the temperature when needed, perfect for chilling drinks or freezing large quantities of fresh food. Fast freezing may help maintain food quality.
Designated storage space for gallon-sized containers, such as milk, juice, and water.

Minimum required depth of the installation location for a standard installation of the product. This measurement will help you determine if the appliance will fit into the desired space and have the clearance necessary for proper operational use. Please refer to the manufacturer’s installation documentation for detailed measurement requirements.
A door-within-door that provides convenient access to your favorite food and drink items without opening the main door.
The product case installs flush with the depth of standard kitchen counters to provide a built-in appearance.
Measurement from the back of the product to its front (with door closed), not including handle.

Minimum required width of the installation location for a standard installation of the product. This measurement will help you determine if the appliance will fit into the desired space and have the clearance necessary for proper operational use. Please refer to the manufacturer’s installation documentation for detailed measurement requirements.

The highest recommended ambient (surrounding) temperature in which the product can ideally operate stated by the manufacturer. Generally long-term exposure of the product to temperatures more than the maximum can result in ineffective operation.

Refrigerators with this feature include a separate compartment with independent temperature controls from the main product. These compartments offer a flexible space that allows you to change the temperature based on your additional storage needs. Whether it’s a place to chill beverages for an evening with friends, keep snacks cool, or even provide extra freezer space.

specifications.displayName: Height To Top Of Refrigerator (Without Hinges)
specifications.definition: Height from bottom of refrigerator to top of the door, without the top hinges.

Devices carrying the ENERGY STAR service mark, such as computer products and peripherals, kitchen appliances, and other products, generally use 20% to 30% less energy than required by federal standards.

Ice build-up can reduce the appliance’s cooling capacity, making it work harder and consume more energy. Defrosting is necessary to maintain its efficiency and each type has its own advantages depending on user needs and preferences. Manual defrost appliances require unplugging to melt ice naturally, but offer more space, lower energy consumption, and lower cost without the internal heating element. Frost-free appliances regulate temperature to prevent ice build-up automatically. Automatic defrost systems use a timer to circulate heat and prevent ice accumulation, while adaptive defrost systems use sensors to determine the optimal times for heat circulation.
The size, arrangement, and physical configuration of the product.
Rated by the Consortium for Energy Efficiency.
Measurement from the back of the product to its front, not including the door.
Measurement from the back of the product to its front (with door closed), including the handle.
Predicted amount of electricity needed to operate the product under average conditions for one year.
Designated storage for deli and other meats helps keep these items accessible and may reduce the risk of cross-contamination.
Strength of electrical current.
A digital assistant built into the device that uses voice commands to answer questions and control smart devices.
The out of box weight of the item.

specifications.displayName: Height To Top Of Door Hinge
specifications.definition: Height from bottom of refrigerator to top of the door, including the top hinge.
This feature, often located within a pull-out freezer drawer, produces and stores ice in addition to the primary ice maker.
Measurement from the back of the product to its front, with the door open at a 90-degree angle.
The out of box depth of the item. Depth is measured as the distance from the front of the item to the back as it would be primarily used or placed.
A filter that works to remove odors and contaminants from the air within the appliance.

features.title: ExtendFresh temperature management system
features.description: Separately monitors the temperatures in the refrigerator and freezer through a sensor located in each, to help ensure fresh fruit juices don't become frozen and prawns avoid freezer burn.

features.title: Interior water dispenser
features.description: Provides easy access to filtered water inside the refrigerator.

features.title: Professionally inspired design
features.description: A bold blend of professionally inspired styling and sleek touches for the home. This refrigerator features satin textured handles with iconic KitchenAid brand medallions and a beautiful chrome frame.

features.title: Produce preserver
features.description: Absorbs ethylene gas emitted by many fruits and vegetables, causing them to over-ripen. By removing ethylene, the produce preserver helps extend freshness.

features.title: Humidity-controlled crispers
features.description: Provide a dedicated storage option with adjustable humidity levels. They let you select the high humidity that keeps romaine crisp, or the arid environment that helps figs and apricots stay fresh.

features.title: FreshChill temperature-controlled full-width pantry
features.description: Provides a manual temperature setting that lets you maintain the freshness of ingredients as varied as a whole salmon or large eggplants. It gives you total control over the amount of cool air that enters the drawer.

features.title: Automatic icemaker
features.description: Ensures a constant supply of ice on hand at all times for entertaining and everyday use.

features.title: Max Cool
features.description: When selected, automatically adjusts the temperature in the refrigerator and freezer to the lowest setting as needed.
This helps keep the refrigerator at the ideal temperature even when you have the doors open for an extended period in order to load all your freshly purchased produce.

features.title: LED lighting
features.description: Uses less energy than incandescent bulbs. Multiple lights are purposefully placed throughout the refrigerator and freezer, making it easy to find items at a glance.

features.title: ENERGY STAR certified
features.description: Products conserve energy by exceeding minimum federal energy efficiency.

features.title: Metallic accents on shelf trim
features.description: Are applied to the leading edges of the refrigerator shelves. These rich accents complement the gloss finish of the interior, to make finding your ingredients as much of a pleasure as using them.

features.title: Metal wine rack
features.description: Provides a durable storage solution for up to four bottles of wine or 2L containers, and can be removed for additional storage flexibility.
